reviewText: I bought this for Man on Fire.  This movie moves me, terrifies me, amazes me, and I am a fan of Denzel Washington.  When playing action characters, he embodies strength and courage, but filled with compassion and humanity.  I believe he chooses his roles carefully.  Man On Fire is unlike any I have ever seen, surprising me at each turn.  Though I have seen it many times, the wild ride remains.  I do not want to give anything away.
You can't beat having these two movies in a double pack! Awesome price since separately they run about 15$ a piece

I was very pleased to have purchased this item, and would do it again. I had never been able to catch the whole thing before. I was pleased. The seller was great, and there were not any shipping issues. I would use the same seller again!
movies are great but the bluray case came damaged. Not sure if due to shipping or poor quality control.
Great combination; wish it was Blu-ray.
Can't ever go wrong with Denzel

You can't go wrong with buying any of these great movies individually, but to get all 4 in one set is AWESOME! Thank you Amazon.com for providing such a variety of selections for Denzel Washington movies, I love them all!
Love both movies. An excellent combo disc!!
